thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good standard Marriott -
thread.title_full: Good standard Marriott - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Cirkeline74
title: Good standard Marriott -
text:
After the reviews I had high expectations to this hotel ,and it was very good,but not worth $300
Staff was very friendly ,and the room good Marriott standard . I didn't like the glass door to the bathroom ,it doesn't give much privacy. I was also told I had a bay view (I asked for it to see the runway ) ,but it was only partly bay view,we didn't see much of the runway
The gym and pool was nice ,wifi worked ok
The bar in the lobby looked nice ,but we didn't try it at it was very crowded because of a conference all the time
M Lounge : very good afternoon service and breakfast ,but I don't understand why they have placed it in a corner without a view . It wasn't the nicest M lounge design I have seen either ,but again ,it was good
